languages.text: "Ох, чую, тяжким ударом будет то, что случилось с Кьявой Гамма, для рода Гапрак... Как бы после этого их соседи по Даргонусу не сожрали окончательно".
"What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."
languages.original_text: "Ох, чую, тяжким ударом будет то, что случилось с Кьявой Гамма, для рода Гапрак... Как бы после этого их соседи по Даргонусу не сожрали окончательно".

traits.locale_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."
"What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."
"What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."
"What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

languages.text: “对贾帕克王朝来说，基亚瓦伽马星上的事故将会是一记沉重的打击。我怀疑……我只希望，这件事情发生之后，贾帕克家族不会被他们在达戈努斯上的对手彻底打垮。”
languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: “对贾帕克王朝来说，基亚瓦伽马星上的事故将会是一记沉重的打击。我怀疑……我只希望，这件事情发生之后，贾帕克家族不会被他们在达戈努斯上的对手彻底打垮。”

languages.text: « Les événements de Kiava Gamma risquent de porter un coup dur à la dynastie Gaprak... J'espère simplement que leurs rivaux sur Dargonus n'en profiteront pas pour les anéantir. »
languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: « Les événements de Kiava Gamma risquent de porter un coup dur à la dynastie Gaprak... J'espère simplement que leurs rivaux sur Dargonus n'en profiteront pas pour les anéantir. »

languages.text: «Lo sucedido en Kiava Gamma supone un duro revés para la dinastía Gaprak... Espero que sus rivales en Dargonus no devoren por completo la casa cuando se enteren».
languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: «Lo sucedido en Kiava Gamma supone un duro revés para la dinastía Gaprak... Espero que sus rivales en Dargonus no devoren por completo la casa cuando se enteren».

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマでの事件はギャプラック王朝にとって大きな痛手になると思います…今後、ダルゴナスのライバル家がギャプラック一族を喰らい尽くさなければいいのですが」
languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマでの事件はギャプラック王朝にとって大きな痛手になると思います…今後、ダルゴナスのライバル家がギャプラック一族を喰らい尽くさなければいいのですが」

languages.text: "Was auf Kiava Gamma geschehen ist, wird wohl ein schwerer Schlag für die Gaprak-Dynastie sein ... Ich hoffe nur, dass ihre Rivalen auf Dargonus die Gapraks nicht vollständig verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: "Was auf Kiava Gamma geschehen ist, wird wohl ein schwerer Schlag für die Gaprak-Dynastie sein ... Ich hoffe nur, dass ihre Rivalen auf Dargonus die Gapraks nicht vollständig verschlingen."

languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'da yaşananların Gaprak hanedanlığına ağır bir darbe olacağını düşünüyorum... Dargonus'taki rakipleri, şimdi Gaprakların kökünü kazımaz umarım."
languages.original_text: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'da yaşananların Gaprak hanedanlığına ağır bir darbe olacağını düşünüyorum... Dargonus'taki rakipleri, şimdi Gaprakların kökünü kazımaz umarım."
